features: Live a Healthier Life:Our mini portable washing machine is designed for delicate and small things. Solve laundry troubles, The mini washer is a better choice for you.Improve the quality of your life.
Foldable Design: The foldable laundry tub washing machine features a foldable and portable bucket type design for easy storage When not in use.

Energy-Saving: The collapsible washing machine mini foldable washer uses high-frequency vibration to effectively remove dirt without residue and irritants. Energy-saving and environmental protection, saving water and electricity.

Easy to Carry:The bucket washing machine folds in a compact size of 12" x 12" x 6" so you can easily carry it out and conveniently wash clothes outdoors.Perfect for camping, vacation, business trip, apartments, dorms.

Easy to Use: If you need an English version of the manual, please contact us.One button to control the washing machine, easy to use, just touch the button for two seconds to start the washing machine.It can also be used to clean fruit.If any parts are missing, please contact us in time.
body.description: DESCRIPTION:Portable Ultrasonic Washing Machine are the best way to clean your precious little baby clothes. It is also ideal to wash diapers hygienically outside the home washing machine. It is a mini washer only for small items, cleaning large products may damage the machine. Folding design, saving space and to carry. Easy to use, saving more electricity and water.Product Name: Mini Folding Washing MachineBefore folding: 12 "x 12" x 11“After folding：12" x 12" x 6"Washing capacity: 8LRated voltage: 12V (110v-220v universal)Rated power: 10WProduct material:ABSProduct weight: 1.2kgProducts include:1 * Washing machine1*Clothes HangerProduct features:1.60W High power motorThe mini washing machine uses a high-powered motor to remove dirt more efficiently. Make clothes cleaner.2.Noise reduction designThe mini folding washing machine adopts noise reduction design, which makes you feel relieved and save effort.3.Newly upgraded washing and leachingThe newly upgraded detachable drain basket, one-button drain, simple operation, can be dried after washing.Note:1.Due to manual measurement, there may be small deviation.2.It is not suitable for washing large and heavy clothes such as jeans.3.The drain basket of our mini washing machine can make your items without dripping and avoid hand-twisting, but it can't completely dry the clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well good quality and value for its money. Very easy to use suction cups stick to the tiles and it’s strong durability

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Brand new and malfunctioning
reviews.reviewText: Constantly traveling and living out of hotel rooms I thought buying this portable washing machine would be convenient for me. Although, it can only wash smaller items it was able to do its job well at the beginning at least. Only after 3 uses I consider it still brand new. Unfortunately, it's already malfunctioning and I can't return since it's out of the 30 day period. It looks sturdy and the color is great but the quality is horrible. There's no explanation why a product that cost $45.00+ should begin to have issues to begin with. Why has it already stopped spinning? Please trust the other reviews and consider buying an alternative option. This portable washer ended up being a huge disappointment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use this product all the time
reviews.reviewText: I like the size, style & ease of use. However my unit did not come with instructions a d I had to look them up on the internet. Still, a great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ideal para trapos pequeños o ropa de bebé
reviews.reviewText: Esta muy bonita, al inicio que la utilice me desepciono un poco porque vi que no le cabían muchos calcetines , pero me di cuenta que lava muy bien, lo que también no le cabe mucho en el canasto para exprimir , para que exprima bien si lave 4 calcetines largos , para exprimir tengo que ponerle solo 3 porque el cuarto lo bota a los lados y ya no exprime bien , aun así todo lo demás funciona muy bien .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't work very well you can only put one or 2 small items at a time in it but they do not come clean just a little better than hand washing my clothes. It takes forever to wash anything. Wasn't really worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Portable washer machine
reviews.reviewText: I like it for this I hand wash doesn’t wring out well but it work with it. I’m elderly living in a bldg that has a laundry room but they keep increasing the cost so I started to hand wash some items to help with the cost.
